long_description: The Gibbon Jibline X13 Slackline features trampoline-style webbing that's thin and dynamic to maximize your power for jumps and tricks on the line. Consisting of only 2 parts, the Gibbon Jibline X13 Slackline kit can be quickly rigged between 2 trees and set up at a length from 10 ft. to 49 ft. X13 slackline is 1.5 ft. longer on the ratchet side than the standard Gibbon Jibline Slackline, letting you set up around bigger trees; also includes a pad for the ratchet. 2 in. wide webbing can be mounted just a couple feet off the ground; webbing features rubber-based prints to add grip. Integrated ratchet lets you set the tension just right: keep it loose for lots of bounce or tighten it up some for more stability. Gibbon Jibline X13 Slackline kit includes slackline, ratchet and instruction manual.
short_description: The Gibbon Jibline X13 Slackline features trampoline-style webbing that's thin and dynamic to maximize your power for jumps and tricks on the line.
